about_the_game:
Uncover the perilous story of Immanis town. Deep in the treacherous caverns lies the Vitality Vessel, key to the town's survival. Harvest resources, outsmart enemies, and restore its energy. Will you save Immanis and escape the depths?

Mine

Harness the power of specialized mining equipment to extract valuable resources from established mines. As you tap into each deposit, you gather the essential materials required for your journey and technological advancements. Your success in mining operations is crucial for survival and uncovering the mysteries that lie ahead.

Combat

Prepare for intense battles where you'll face waves of relentless enemies. Develop your combat skills to fend off the creatures of the deep and survive their increasingly fierce attacks. Your survival depends on your ability to adapt and overcome the adversities of this hostile environment.

Upgrade

Progress through the game allows you to upgrade your engineer's abilities, enhance your ship's capabilities, and augment your weapons to increase their power. Strategic upgrades are essential to withstand tougher enemies and explore more treacherous zones.
